casebody.data:
BIOTEC BIOLOGISCHE NATURVERPACKUNGEN GmbH & CO. KG, Plaintiff-Cross Appellant, v. BIOCORP, INC. and NOVAMONT, S.p.A., Defendants-Appellants. No. 99-1578, 00-1093, 00-1094. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Aug. 15, 2001.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, NEWMAN, and SCHALL, Circuit Judges.

ON MOTION

ORDER

The parties file a joint stipulation to dismiss all appeals in this matter pursuant to Fed. R.App. P. 42(b).

Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED THAT:

1) The motion is granted. The appeals are dismissed with prejudice.

2) Each side shall bear its own costs.
